These individuals will be stuck in the HU-1 incarna- tional cycles until they can build the fifth strand or until the next morphoge- netic wave period 2213 years later, whichever comes first. The Halls of Amenti will remain passable only to those who organically possessed the fifth DNA strand imprint. The 10-year period, starting five years before and end- ing five years after the half-cycle point, allows the races the opportunity for an evolutionary leap in time.
